definitions.definition: Beta vulgaris , a plant with a swollen root which is eaten or used to make sugar.
examples: The beet is a hardy species.

definitions.definition: A beetroot ; a swollen root of such a plant used as a culinary vegetable .

main_definition: Beta vulgaris , a plant with a swollen root which is eaten or used to make sugar.
secondary_definitions: ( US , Canada ) A beetroot ; a swollen root of such a plant used as a culinary vegetable .
